model.name: WINEDB
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE WINE_PG ( wine_id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"wine_id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), name string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"name"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), varietal string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"varietal"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), vineyard string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"vineyard"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), year integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"year"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT food_pkey PRIMARY KEY(r_id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"public"."wine"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')

model.name: Services
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Wine ( wine_id integer NOT NULL, name string(255) NOT NULL, varietal string(255) NOT NULL, vineyard string(255) NOT NULL, year integer NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT food_pkey PRIMARY KEY(r_id) ) AS SELECT 1, 'WINE_RHT', 'WINE_SUMMIT', 'WINE_2017', 2017;
